info.title: DOMParser for Applications
info.description: Class for parsing xml files in the account's application folder.

parameter.name: $path
parameter.description: The document relative path to the account's application folder.

parameter.name: $preserve
parameter.description: Indicates whether the parser will preserve whitespaces during load.

method.name: save
method.description: Saves the file in the given filepath.

parameter.name: $path
parameter.description: The relative path in the account's application folder.

parameter.name: $fileName
parameter.description: The filename. Leave empty if the file name is included in the path.

parameter.name: $format
parameter.description: Indicator whether the parser will save formated xml or unformatted.
